name: Standard Campaign Guide
description: Complete guide covering all essential campaign progression with rewards and warnings for permanent bonuses.
author: Exile Compass

quests.name: **[The Riverbank]** - Kill **Bloated Miller**
quests.description: Complete tutorial

quests.name: **[The Clearfell Encampment]** - Claim Quest Reward from **Renly**
quests.description: Check Renly's shop for affordable items

quests.name: **[Clearfell]** - Loot Abandoned Stash in Mysterious Campsite
**[Clearfell]** - Kill **Beira of the Rotten Pack**
quests.description: Middle North of the zone

quests.name: **[The Mud Burrow]** - Return to **Renly**
quests.description: Portal to town and speak to Renly

quests.name: **[The Grelwood]** - Kill **Areagne** at Witch Hut
quests.description: Flask upgrades from Cauldron

quests.name: **[The Red Vale]** - Activate 3 Rust Altars and kill **The Rust King**
quests.description: Each altar in broad loop around zone

quests.name: **[The Grelwood]** - Runed Spike the Tree of Souls
quests.description: Return Runed Quest Items to Renly, summon Una

quests.name: **[Cemetery of the Eternals]** - Loot Ancient Ruins Grave Site
**[Mausoleum of the Praetor]** - Loot Forgotten Riches
**[Mausoleum of the Praetor]** - Kill **Draven, Eternal Praetor**
**[Tomb of the Consort]** - Activate Embattled Trove
quests.description: Defeat Rare Eternal Knight

quests.name: **[Tomb of the Consort]** - Kill **Asinia, Praetor Consort**
**[Cemetery of the Eternals]** - Kill **Lachlann of Endless Lament**
quests.description: Open Memorial Gate with Lachlann

quests.name: **[The Hunting Grounds]** - Kill Dryads at Dryadic Ritual
**[Freythorn]** - Kill **The King in the Mists**
quests.description: Complete 3 Rituals, activate Gembloom Skull

quests.name: **[Freythorn]** - Speak to **Finn** for Charm reward
quests.description: Choose Ruby, Sapphire or Topaz Charm (Sapphire recommended)

quests.name: **[Ogham Farmlands]** - Find **Una's Lute** and deliver to Una
quests.description: In ruined hut behind broken carts

quests.name: **[Ogham Farmlands]** - Kill Rare Feral Mutt in Crop Circle
**[Ogham Village]** - Find **Smithing Tools** and deliver to **Renly**
quests.description: Anvil Sign, Large Building (only needed once per league)

quests.name: **[Manor Ramparts]** - Return to town and speak to **Leitis**
**[Manor Ramparts]** - Cut down Hanged Man at Gallows
**[Ogham Manor]** - Kill **Count Ogham**
quests.description: Speak to Hooded One to proceed to Act 2

quests.name: **[Vastiri Outskirts]** - Kill **Rathbreaker**
quests.description: Portal to town or respawn at checkpoint

quests.name: **[Ardura Caravan]** - Speak to **Risu** and **Asala**
quests.description: Shop and gear up, travel to Mawdun Quarry

quests.name: **[Mawdun Mine]** - Kill **Rudja, the Dread Engineer**
quests.description: Free Risu, speak to them in town

quests.name: **[Traitor's Passage]** - Kill **Balbala, the Traitor**
quests.description: Open Ancient Seal for Ascendancy
quests.reward: Balbala's Barya for Trial of Sekhemas

quests.name: **[Halani Gates]** - Kill **Jamanra**
quests.description: Run to sandstorm, return to town, speak to Zarka

quests.name: **[Trial of the Sekhemas]** - Complete Ascendancy Trial
quests.description: Place Balbala's Barya, complete first floor, defeat Rattlecage

quests.name: **[Keth]** - Kill **Kabala, Constrictor Queen**
quests.description: Find Kabala Clan Relic, boss in middle underground pit

quests.name: **[The Lost City]** - Loot Gilded Beetle
quests.reward: Random Ruby, Sapphire, or Emerald Jewel

quests.name: **[Buried Shrines]** - Complete Elemental Offering
quests.description: Choose Fire if Fire Resistance is low

quests.name: **[Buried Shrines]** - Kill **Azarian the Forsaken Son**
quests.description: Speak to Water Goddess, ignite with Everburning Cinders

quests.name: **[Buried Shrines]** - Return to **Zarka**
quests.description: Portal to town and speak to Zarka

quests.name: **[The Bone Pits]** - Find Sun Clan Relic
quests.description: Kill monsters until relic drops

quests.name: **[Valley of the Titans]** - Place Sun and Kabala Clan Relics
quests.description: Choose permanent buff (can swap anytime)
quests.reward: 30% increased Charm Charges gained, +1 Charm Slot OR 30% increased Charm Effect Duration, +1 Charm Slot

quests.name: **[Titan Grotto]** - Kill **Zalmarath, the Colossus**
quests.description: Click 3 ancient seals by Titans first, return to Zarka

quests.name: **[Deshar]** - Find Final Letter and deliver to **Shambrin**
quests.description: Check base of round buildings for Fallen Dekhara

quests.name: **[Path of Mourning]** - Complete Shifting Vases event
**[The Spires of Deshar]** - Activate Sisters of Garukhan Shrine
**[The Spires of Deshar]** - Kill **Tor Gul, the Defiler**
quests.description: Shop for 20% Movespeed Boots, Colossal Flasks, Solar Amulets

quests.name: **[The Dreadnought]** - Farm final checkpoint
quests.description: Multiple blue monsters for quick leveling

quests.name: **[Dreadnought Vanguard]** - Kill **Jamanra, the Abomination**
quests.description: Speak to Asala and Hooded One, travel to Act 3

quests.name: **[Sandswept Marsh]** - Loot Corpse at Hanging Tree
**[Sandswept Marsh]** - Kill Rare Oroks and loot Orok Campsite Basket
**[Ziggurat Encampment]** - Speak to **Alva** and **Oswald**
quests.description: Shop for Flask upgrades and 20% Movespeed Boots

quests.name: **[Jungle Ruins]** - Kill **Mighty Silverfist**
quests.description: Within stone ruins

quests.name: **[Jungle Ruins]** - Summon NPC to Jungle Grave
**[Jungle Ruins]** - Visit Gwendolyn Albright's Campsite
quests.description: Check vendor for high quality armour upgrades

quests.name: **[The Venom Crypts]** - Find **Corpse-snake Venom** and deliver to **Servi**
quests.description: Permanent choice
quests.reward: 25% increased Stun Threshold OR 30% increased Elemental Ailment Threshold OR 25% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
quests.warning: Permanent choice - cannot be changed later!

quests.name: **[Infested Barrens]** - Visit Sebastian Carroway's Campsite
quests.description: Check vendor for weapon upgrades

quests.name: **[The Azak Bog]** - Complete Flameskin Ritual
quests.description: Only if Fire Resistance is very low (below 30-40%)
quests.reward: Temporary Fire Resistance and Rarity boost

quests.name: **[The Azak Bog]** - Kill **Ignagduk, The Bog Witch**
quests.description: Speak to Servi for Charm reward (Thawing or Antidote recommended)

quests.name: **[Jiquani's Machinarium]** - Kill **Blackjaw, the Remnant**
quests.description: Use Small Soul Cores to open doors

quests.name: **[Jiquani's Machinarium]** - Unlock Treasure Vault
quests.description: Use third Soul Core

quests.name: **[Jiquani's Sanctum]** - Kill **Zicoatl, Warden of the Core**
quests.description: Place Medium Soul Cores in both generators

quests.name: **[Jiquani's Sanctum]** - Use Corruption Altar
quests.description: Gamble to corrupt an item

quests.name: **[Matlan Waterways]** - Drain water and activate large Lever
quests.description: Reveals Drowned City on World Map

quests.name: **[Trial of Chaos]** - Complete Ascendancy Trial
quests.description: Use Chimeral Inscribed Ultimatum, defeat randomized boss

quests.name: **[The Molten Vault]** - Kill **Mektul, the Forgemaster**
quests.description: DPS check boss, give Hammer of Kamasa to Oswald
quests.reward: Level 10 Uncut Skill Gem + Reforging Bench unlock

quests.name: **[Apex of Filth]** - Complete Cauldron Keeper's Cauldron
quests.description: Collect Red, Green, Blue Mushrooms, check vendor

quests.name: **[Apex of Filth]** - Kill **Queen of Filth**
quests.description: Obtain Temple Door Idol, speak to Alva

quests.name: **[Temple of Kopec]** - Kill **Ketzuil, High Priest of the Sun**
quests.description: Follow Alva through time portal

quests.name: **[Utzaal]** - Kill **Viper Napuatzi**
quests.description: Follow main road through zone

quests.name: **[Aggorat]** - Kill Vaal enemies until Sacrificial Heart drops
quests.description: Use Sacrificial Altar and Dagger (can also drop in Utzaal)

quests.name: **[Whakapanu Island]** - Complete for Trading Access
quests.description: Clear Singing Caverns, speak to Ange, clear hideout
quests.reward: Currency Exchange and Asynchronous Trading access

quests.name: **[Abandoned Prison]** - Find **Goddess Of Justice**
quests.description: Choose permanent buff (can swap anytime)
quests.reward: +30% Increased Mana recovery from flasks OR +30% Increased Life recovery from flasks

quests.name: **[Kedge Bay]** - Complete quest in Journey's End
quests.description: Return to trapped NPC after boss
quests.reward: Delirium Distilled Emotions for Amulet instilling

quests.name: Complete the quest Clearing The Way
quests.description: Kill **Akthi and Anundr**, talk to Risu

quests.name: **[The Khari Crossing]** - Enter the Skullmaw Stairway
quests.description: Find Molten Shrine, use Molten One's Gift

quests.name: **[Qimah]** - Find **The Seven Pillars**
quests.description: Choose one bonus (can swap anytime)
quests.reward: +5 to all Attributes | +5 to all Elemental Resistances | 12% Increased Cooldown Recovery Rate | 3% Increased Movement Speed | 20% Increased Presence Area Of Effect | 15% Increased Global Defences | 5% Increased Experience Gain
quests.warning: Experience bonus inverts all other bonuses!

quests.name: **[Kriar Village]** - Kill **Lythara, The Wayward Spear**
quests.description: Reaches 100 total Spirit

quests.name: **[Kriar Peaks]** - Find and talk to the Elder Madox
quests.description: Permanent choice

quests.name: Talk to The Hooded One in Kingsmarch
quests.description: After finishing Interlude Acts
